PC Number: 2011-0026

Date: 2011-01-24

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 16(2) of the Canadian Space Agency Act, hereby approves the remuneration of Chris Hadfield, Astronaut, as established by the Canadian Space Agency and set out in the annexed schedule, which salary is within Grade 3 ($145,200 - $171,000) of the Astronaut Salary Scale, effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 16(2) of the Canadian Space Agency Act, hereby approves the remuneration of Julie Payette, Astronaut, as established by the Canadian Space Agency and set out in the annexed schedule, which salary is within Grade 3 ($145,200 - $171,000) of the Astronaut Salary Scale, effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 16(2) of the Canadian Space Agency Act, hereby approves the remuneration of David Saint-Jacques, Astronaut, as established by the Canadian Space Agency and set out in the annexed schedule, which salary is within Grade 1 ($87,600 - $122,000) of the Astronaut Salary Scale, effective April 1, 2010.

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 16(2) of the Canadian Space Agency Act, hereby approves the remuneration of Robert Thirsk, Astronaut, as established by the Canadian Space Agency and set out in the annexed schedule, which salary is within Grade 3 ($145,200 - $171,000) of the Astronaut Salary Scale, effective April 1, 2010.
